996.name: AA 309LMoP
996.Applications: Cladding applications in case a AISI 316 is required in the first layer, suitable for dissimilar welding of steel to stainless steel, heat resistant up to 1050 degrees Celsius
996.Suitable_For: Cladding on low alloyed steels in case a 18/8/2 CrNiMo layer is required in the first layer. 1.4401, 1.4404, 1.4406, 1.4410, 1.4437, 1.4571, 1.4580
